bike.description: 6061 aluminum main tubes, over-sized seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger
bike.paint_description: M: Grenade or Gloss Black   F: Midnight Violet

components.description: RST Gila MLO, alloy crown & lowers, coil spring with mechanical lock-out, external preload adjustor, 28mm stanchions, 80mm travel (12-13") 100mm travel (15-21")
Alex TD25 double-wall disc-specific rims with reinforced spoke bed, 32H, alloy 6-bolt disc hubs with QR, 14g black electro-plated spokes
Shimano Acera M360 rear and M190 front
SR Suntour XCC-T102 alloy crank arms, 42/34/24T rings, 170mm
ATB platform, hi-impact resin cage & body
Tektro Novela mechanical disc brakes with 6" rotors and Shimano levers
Jamis XC riser, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 13mm rise x 620mm
Jamis XC alloy threadless, 10JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm (12-15"), 100mm (17-18"), 110mm (19") and 120mm (21")
Jamis ATB Sport with pressure relief channel, SL cover, protective front and rear guards
